column1: Electronic and Communication Engineering (with Placement) MSc
column5: September 2023 is the last intake for this course.This course is specifically aimed at International students, supporting those wishing to gain practical work based experiential learning. Together with studying your chosen course we are offering you the opportunity to secure a placement* for an additional 6 months, making the course 18 months in length. This allows students with limited experience to put into practice the skills and techniques developed throughout the Masterâ€™s
